summary: 1997 LINCOLN MARK VIII DEFROSTER/HEATER/AC BLEND DOOR:  THE BLEND DOOR ON MY 1997 LINCOLN HAS MALFUNCTIONED.  THIS IS A VERY COMMON PROBLEM ON ALL MARK VIII LINCOLNS CAUSING A MALFUNCTION IN THE WINDSHIELD DEFROSTER.  THERE IS NO HEAT APPLIED TO THE WINDSHIELD WHILE ATTEMTING TO DEFROST.  LINCOLN/FORD HAS IGNORED THIS VERY COMMON PROBLEM AND HAS OFFERED NO HELP.  I AM SUGGESTING A RECALL BE MADE ON ALL 1997 AND 1998 LINCOLNS.
